div.h1: Welcome to Fisher CUSD #1, Home of the Bunnies

div.style: text-align: center; border: solid 8px #DF6F1C; padding: 15px 15px; border-radius: 24px; display: inline-block; background: #171715; margin-left: 25px;

div.p: Best Memory at Fisher: senior year homecoming parade & winning Homecoming Queen with my best friend Will Delaney as King!
Activities: Cheer, track, softball, basketball, Polar Plunge, Junior Class Officer, National Honor Society, CEO Program, Carrot Crew
Plans after Graduation: I will be attending ISU to study Physical Education
We've all played Rock, Paper, Scissors, but do you know the story behind the game? Read along with Mrs. Clemmons as she share with you a story of three brave warriors! ✊✋✌
It’s Teacher Tuesday! Here’s a some words of encouragement from our Second & Third grade faculty!
Best Memory at Fisher: Making a family I’ll never forget & memories that’ll last a lifetime
Activities: many sports, student council, and Polar Plunge
Plans after Graduation: attend Illinois State University & study nursing.
